author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the spring onions, vegetarian bacon and chilli flakes for 2-3 minutes. Add the cherry tomatoes and simmer for 2-3 minutes. Add the cooked pasta to the pan and stir well to coat in the sauce. To serve, stir the parsley into the pasta and place into a serving dish.
